dynamic-hibernate.query: SELECT queue_Nm, customer_Id FROM CSL_QUEUE_CUSTOMER WHERE 1=1 #if($queue_Nm) AND queue_Nm = :queue_Nm #end #if($customer_Id) AND customer_Id = :customer_Id #end ORDER BY customer_Id DESC

SELECT qc.queue_Nm, c.customer_Id, c.name, c.ip, c.port, c.url, c.type, c.check_Port, c.check_Url, c.check_Type, c.system_Status, c.manual_Status, c.customerGroup_Nm FROM CSL_CUSTOMER c, CSL_QUEUE_CUSTOMER qc WHERE 1=1 #if($queue_Nm) AND qc.queue_Nm = :queue_Nm #end #if($name) AND c.name LIKE :name #end #if($ip) AND c.ip LIKE :ip #end #if($port) AND c.port = :port #end #if($type) AND c.type = :type #end #if($check_Port) AND c.check_Port = :check_Port #end #if($check_Type) AND c.check_Type = :check_Type #end #if($system_Status) AND c.system_Status = :system_Status #end #if($manual_Status) AND c.manual_Status = :manual_Status #end #if($customerGroup_Nm) AND c.customerGroup_Nm = :customerGroup_Nm #end AND c.customer_Id = qc.customer_Id ORDER BY c.customer_Id DESC

SELECT c.customer_Id, c.name, c.ip, c.port, c.url, c.type, c.check_Port, c.check_Url, c.check_Type, c.system_Status, c.manual_Status, c.customerGroup_Nm FROM CSL_CUSTOMER c WHERE 1=1 #if($name) AND c.name LIKE :name #end #if($ip) AND c.ip LIKE :ip #end #if($port) AND c.port = :port #end #if($type) AND c.type = :type #end #if($check_Port) AND c.check_Port = :check_Port #end #if($check_Type) AND c.check_Type = :check_Type #end #if($system_Status) AND c.system_Status = :system_Status #end #if($manual_Status) AND c.manual_Status = :manual_Status #end #if($customerGroup_Nm) AND c.customerGroup_Nm = :customerGroup_Nm #end AND c.customer_Id NOT IN (SELECT customer_Id FROM CSL_QUEUE_CUSTOMER WHERE queue_Nm = :queue_Nm) ORDER BY c.customer_Id DESC

SELECT q.queue_Nm, q.is_Repeat, q.expire_Time, q.manual_Status, qc.customer_Id FROM CSL_QUEUE q, CSL_QUEUE_CUSTOMER qc WHERE 1=1 #if($customer_Id) AND qc.customer_Id = :customer_Id #end #if($queue_Nm) AND q.queue_Nm = :queue_Nm #end #if($manual_Status) AND q.manual_Status = :manual_Status #end AND q.queue_Nm = qc.queue_Nm

SELECT c.customer_Id, c.name, c.ip, c.port, c.url, c.type, c.check_Port, c.check_Url, c.check_Type, c.system_Status, c.manual_Status, c.customerGroup_Nm, qc.queue_Nm FROM CSL_CUSTOMER c, CSL_QUEUE_CUSTOMER qc WHERE 1=1 #if($queue_Nm) AND qc.queue_Nm = :queue_Nm #end #if($system_Status) AND c.system_Status = :system_Status #end #if($manual_Status) AND c.manual_Status = :manual_Status #end #if($customerGroup_Nm) AND c.customerGroup_Nm = :customerGroup_Nm #end AND c.customer_Id = qc.customer_Id
